Public Remarks: Coveted Evergreen Village Square! Wonderful 4 bedroom, 2.5 bath home, beautifully updated inside & out! Very light and bright with large picture windows throughout that showcase incredible views of both the Eastern foothills & across Silicon Valley. Lovely living room, centers around a stately brick fireplace & opens to the dining area - perfect for entertaining all year-round. Updated chef's kitchen with granite countertops, shaker cabinetry, & windows overlooking the expansive backyard. Primary suite with dual closets, spa-like bath, and windows overlooking the landscaped front yard. Two upper bedrooms, with full bath - perfect for the kids, guests or for one or more work-from-home offices. Main floor bedroom, ideal for the in-laws, a den, or an additional home office. Amazing outdoor oasis with both sun & shade: covered patio, sunny dining area, raised-bed garden, and private hot tub with scenic deck. Additional features: oversized garage with electric car charger, paid solar, in-home laundry and boat/RV parking This family-friendly, tree-lined neighborhood is just a half a mile to all the shops, restaurants, & twice-weekly farmer's market located on the Square. Don't miss this special home!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Dori Irwin - Agt: 925-787-6536 - Welcome to this stunning and completely renovated home! This spacious five-bedroom, three-bathroom home is nestled on a corner lot in a serene cul-de-sac. Ideal for multigenerational living or guests, this home boasts a first-floor bedroom and full bath. With two inviting living rooms and an abundance of natural light throughout, enjoy versatile living spaces for every occasion. The kitchen has brand new quartz countertops, and brand new never used stainless steel appliances. Step outside to a beautiful low-maintenance backyard, perfect for entertaining family and friends. Located next to top schools, parks, hiking trails, and a variety of shopping and dining options, this residence offers both style and tranquility in a city that has it all. Welcome home to comfort, convenience, and community.This property is zoned for Matsumoto Elementary & Chaboya Middle School.

Public Remarks: In Evergreen Area, this single-story home offers tranquility and breathtaking mountain views. With some upgrades throughout, and a great floor plan, you can find many opportunities to customize it to your liking. The front room is a versatile space with high ceilings, and plumbed for an additional bathroom if desired. Continue through the cozy family room through to the kitchen/dining room combo that features stainless steel appliances and The remodeled hall bathroom features new floors, a stylish vanity, and a shower over the tub. A sunroom with a built-in firepit allows year-round enjoyment. The backyard boasts flourishing citrus, plum, and persimmon trees, along with vibrant birds of paradise. It's an ideal setting for both solitude and entertaining. Enjoy convenient access to Silicon Valley's tech hub, top-rated schools, and a family-friendly environment. Enhance your quality of life with the perfect blend of nature, education, and community.

Public Remarks: Rare listing!!! Bright, well-maintained, and expansive home in the Evergreen area. Excellent floor plan. Stunning marble tile foyer, premium hardwood flooring, and a curved staircase. Lots of recent upgrades, including some new appliances. High ceilings and the curved staircase amplify the beautiful entryway into the living and dining rooms. The family room boasts a wet bar with a built-in wine rack, opening to a large kitchen with a spacious breakfast area and plenty of cabinets. There is one bedroom and a full bathroom on the first floor. On the second floor, you'll find a huge master bedroom with high ceilings, a large full bath with a Jacuzzi, two walk-in closets, and a marble fireplace. Two spacious bedrooms share a full bathroom. The fifth bedroom stands out with its sizeable space and a lofty 20 ft high ceiling, making it perfect for a home office or recreation room. Within walking distance, you'll find award-winning elementary and middle schools, Evergreen Community College, a bus stop for high-tech companies, Evergreen Village Square shopping, restaurants, a library, farmers market, trails, and parks.

With nearly 2500 sq/ft of living space, including the converted garage, this expansive two-story residence boasts an open floor plan adorned with tasteful upgrades. Enjoy fresh interior and exterior paint, new flooring, and picturesque landscaping. Delight in foothill views from the kitchen, revel in the warmth of the marble gas fireplace and appreciate modern amenities like double-pane windows, and recessed lighting. The large bonus room, beautifully upgraded bathrooms, and contemporary fixtures add a touch of modern elegance, while leased solar panels ensure energy efficiency. Included with the property is membership in convenient neighborhood Swim center.

Public Remarks: Live life Grandly in Evergreens highly sought-after school district. Prestige. Convenience. Family. This stunning residence offers an unparalleled lifestyle opportunity within walking distance of the citys top-rated schools. Imagine your children receiving the best education while you enjoy the comfort and luxury this home embodies. Soaring high ceilings greet you upon entry, creating a sense of grandeur throughout the open floor plan. The brand new kitchen, a chefs dream, boasts top-of-the-line appliances and design that inspires culinary creations. Entertain effortlessly with ample space for family gatherings and grand soirees, spilling out onto the expansive stamped concrete patio. A newly installed outdoor countertop and sink make barbecues and alfresco dining a breeze. This home caters not only to grand entertaining but also to fostering strong family bonds. A unique feature is the massive fifth bedroom on the first level, perfect for hosting extended stays by visiting relatives or loved ones. Privacy is assured, while fostering a warm, connected atmosphere. Dont miss your chance to own this exquisite residence - exceptional homes like this rarely stay on the market for more than ten days.

Public Remarks: Remodeled home nestled in a beautiful, quiet Evergreen neighborhood with $150K in upgrades. This property features 4BR/2BA, 1,670SF of building space and a huge ~ 9,000SF lot! Open floor plan with an abundance of natural light. New kitchen - contemporary shaker cabinetry, oversized island with waterfall Quartz countertop, SS appliances. New designer paint. Huge family room with cozy wood burning fireplace. New wide plank SPC waterproof flooring, 5 baseboards throughout. New recessed lighting. Remodeled bathrooms with designer fixtures. Spacious master BR suite. Double pane windows. Central heating and air conditioning. Low maintenance front & backyard with automated drip and sprinklers. Energy efficient solar system. Peaceful neighborhood w/ gorgeous views of the Evergreen hills. Walk to Cabana club house. Minutes to the Facebook, Google & Apple bus stop, Evergreen public library, Evergreen Village Square, farmers market and parks. Great Cadwallader Elementary & Silver Creek HS.
